translation.en: [reporter 1] Taylor Swift the singer, she goes to court today
translation.zh: 歌手泰勒·斯威夫特今天要上庭

translation.en: against a former radio DJ she says once groped her.
translation.zh: 起诉一位电台前DJ她说这位DJ曾猥亵过她

translation.en: [reporter 2] Swift says this picture shows the moment
translation.zh: 斯威夫特说 从这张照片就能看出米勒猥亵了她

translation.en: Mueller inappropriately grabbed her, putting his hand up her skirt.
translation.zh: 斯威夫特说 从这张照片就能看出米勒猥亵了她 他把手放在她的短裙上

translation.en: [Taylor] This had happened to me. We told his boss.
translation.zh: 我们对他的老板说自己遭遇过这种事

translation.en: They did an investigation. He got fired,
translation.zh: 他们进行了调查 然后把他开除了

translation.en: then he sued me for millions of dollars,
translation.zh: 后来他起诉我 要我赔偿数百万美元

translation.en: so I countersued for one dollar.
translation.zh: 所以我反诉 要求他赔偿一美元

translation.en: You walk into a courtroom,
translation.zh: 你走进法庭

translation.en: and then there's this person sitting in a swivel chair,
translation.zh: 转椅上坐着一个人

translation.en: staring at you like you did something to him.
translation.zh: 盯着你看 仿佛你对他做过什么事

translation.en: The first thing they say to you in court
translation.zh: 他们在法庭上对你说的第一句话

translation.en: is, "Why didn't you scream?
translation.zh: 就是“你当时为何没有尖叫？

translation.en: Why didn't you react quicker?
translation.zh: 为何没有更快速地采取行动？

translation.en: Why didn't you stand further away from him?"
translation.zh: 你为何不站得离他远一点？”

translation.en: Then he has a lawyer get up and just lie.
translation.zh: 然后他的律师站起来 谎话连篇

translation.en: There were seven people who saw him do this,
translation.zh: 有七个人见过他这样做

translation.en: and we had a photo of it happening.
translation.zh: 我们有当时的照片

translation.en: And I was so angry.
translation.zh: 我当时很生气

translation.en: I was angry that I had to be there.
translation.zh: 我生气自己一定要出席

translation.en: I was angry that this happens to women.
translation.zh: 我生气女人总会遇到这样的事

translation.en: I was angry that people are paid to antagonize victims.
translation.zh: 我生气有人会收钱 来对付受害者

translation.en: I was angry that all the details had been twisted.
translation.zh: 我生气所有细节都被歪曲了

translation.en: You don't feel a sense of any victory when you win...
translation.zh: 就算你赢了 也没有胜利的感觉

translation.en: because the process is so dehumanizing.
translation.zh: 因为整个过程毫无人性

translation.en: This is with seven witnesses and a photo.
translation.zh: 本案有七名目击者和一张照片

translation.en: What happens when you get raped, and it's your word against his?
translation.zh: 如果你被强奸 跟他之间只有彼此的说辞 会怎么样？

translation.en: So, um, I just wanted to… [sighs]
translation.zh: 所以我只想…

translation.en: Just kind of looking back, um…
translation.zh: 只想回想…

translation.en: this exact day a year ago, um…
translation.zh: 一年前的这一天

translation.en: ...I was, uh… I was not playing a sold-out stadium in Tampa,
translation.zh: 我不是在坦帕座无虚席的体育馆里表演

translation.en: I was-- I was in a courtroom in Denver, Colorado, um…
translation.zh: 而是在科罗拉多州丹佛市的法庭上

translation.en: Honestly, I-I was there for a sexual assault case,
translation.zh: 说实话 我去那里是为了一起性骚扰案件

translation.en: and…
translation.zh: 而且…

translation.en: t-this day, a year ago, was the day that, um…
translation.zh: 一年前的这一天就是…

translation.en: [voice breaking] …uh, the day that the jury decided in my favor and said that they believed me.
translation.zh: 这一天 陪审团做出对我有利的裁决说他们相信我

translation.en: I guess I just think about all the people that weren't believed,
translation.zh: 我想我只是想到了所有那些不曾被人相信

translation.en: people who haven't been believed,
translation.zh: 和尚未被人相信的人

translation.en: or the people who are afraid to s-speak up because they think they won't be believed.
translation.zh: 或是那些认为人们不会相信自己因而害怕开口的人

translation.en: And…
translation.zh: 而且…

translation.en: And I just… I just wanted to say that, um…
translation.zh: 我只想说…

translation.en: I just wanted to say I'm sorry to anyone who ever wasn't believed
translation.zh: 对于不曾被人相信的那些人我只想说我很遗憾

translation.en: because I don't know h-- what turn my life would have taken if somebody'd--
translation.zh: 因为如果我说自己遭遇了什么事

translation.en: if people didn't believe me
translation.zh: 而人们不相信我

translation.en: when I said that something had happened to me.
translation.zh: 我不知道我的人生会有怎样的转折

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: -[Andrea crying] I'm so proud of you… -Thanks, Mom.
translation.zh: -我真替你骄傲…-谢谢你 妈

translation.en: …for taking this shitbag of shit they gave you.
translation.zh: …你承受了这样不幸的遭遇

translation.en: -And you made it into this. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 你化险为夷

translation.en: [Andrea] I'm really proud of you.
translation.zh: 我很骄傲

translation.en: -[sniffles] -It's okay now.
translation.zh: 现在没事了

translation.en: [Andrea pats Taylor] I'm good.
translation.zh: 我没事了

translation.en: [Taylor] I-I just…
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: I couldn't really stop thinking about it.
translation.zh: 我一直在想这件事

translation.en: And I just thought to myself,
translation.zh: 我心想

translation.en: "Next time there is any opportunity to change anything,
translation.zh: “下次如果有机会能改变任何事

translation.en: you had better know what you stand for and what you wanna say."
translation.zh: 你最好知道自己代表什么以及想要说什么”

translation.en: We are less than three weeks out until the midterms,
translation.zh: 还有不到三周就要进行中期选举了

translation.en: and Tennessee's senate candidate Marsha Blackburn is up in the polls.
translation.zh: 田纳西州参议员候选人玛莎·布雷克本的民调排名上升

translation.en: Congratulations, I know you've got a little momentum going.
translation.zh: 恭喜 我知道你势头强劲

translation.en: This is the third poll in a row that has shown you in the lead.
translation.zh: 这是你连续三次民调排名领先了

translation.en: [Taylor] My team's really not happy with me right now.
translation.zh: 我的团队现在对我不是很满意

translation.en: All I've talked about for the last couple of months is the election in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 过去几个月来我一直在谈论田纳西州的选举

translation.en: It's not that I want to step into this. I just-- I can't not at this point. Like…
translation.zh: 我并不是想介入此事在现在这个时候 我做不到 好像…

translation.en: something is different in my life,
translation.zh: 我的生活发生了变化

translation.en: completely and unchangeably different since the sexual assault trial last year.
translation.zh: 自从去年的性骚扰案件庭审之后我的生活跟以前大不相同

translation.en: Like, and no… no man in my organization or in my family
translation.zh: 我的公司或家里没有男人

translation.en: will ever understand what that was like.
translation.zh: 能够理解这种感觉

translation.en: [man 1] For 12 years, we've not got involved with politics or religion.
translation.zh: 12年来 我们从未涉足政治或宗教

translation.en: Yeah, but this is on the home front.
translation.zh: 是的 但这是在老家

translation.en: And also, back in the presidential election,
translation.zh: 而且 在总统大选的时候

translation.en: I was in such a horrendous place
translation.zh: 我当时处境非常糟糕

translation.en: that I wasn't gonna pop my head out of the sand for anything.
translation.zh: 以至于我不会为了任何事情站出来

translation.en: [Scott] Why would you?
translation.zh: 你为什么要站出来？

translation.en: I mean, does Bob Hope do it? Did Bing Crosby do it?
translation.zh: 鲍勃·霍普站出来了吗？宾·克罗斯比站出来了吗？

translation.en: -Does-- Does Mick Jagger do it? -[Andrea] Honey, what the hell? Come on!
translation.zh: -米克·贾格尔站出来了吗？-宝贝 搞什么？拜托！

translation.en: -[Scott] What I'm saying is-- -Bob Hope and Bing Crosby?
translation.zh: -不 我现在要说的是…-鲍勃·霍普和宾·克罗斯比？

translation.en: First of all, these aren't your dad's celebrities,
translation.zh: 首先 他们不是你爸爸喜欢的名人

translation.en: and these aren't your dad's Republicans.
translation.zh: 他们不是你爸爸支持的共和党人

translation.en: [man 1] Imagine if we came to you and said, "Hey, we've got this idea
translation.zh: 想象一下 如果我们过来对你说：“嘿 我们有个主意

translation.en: that we could halve the number of people that come to your next tour."
translation.zh: 可以让你下次巡演的观众人数减半”

translation.en: [man 2] The other thing, just from a security standpoint,
translation.zh: 另外 从安全性立场来看

translation.en: "Taylor Swift comes out against Trump."
translation.zh: “泰勒·斯威夫特公开反对特朗普”

translation.en: I don't care if they write that!
translation.zh: 我不在乎他们这样写！

translation.en: I'm sad that I didn't two years ago, but I can't change that.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾两年前没有站出来但这一点无法改变

translation.en: I'm saying right now
translation.zh: 我现在说的是

translation.en: that this is something that I know is right,
translation.zh: 我知道有一件事是对的 而你们…

translation.en: and, you guys, I need to be on the right side of history.
translation.zh: 我知道有一件事是对的 而你们… 我必须站在历史正确的一边

translation.en: And if he doesn't win…
translation.zh: 如果他没赢 至少我试过了

translation.en: -[stammering] …then at least I tried. -[man 2] Taylor, here's the problem.
translation.zh: 如果他没赢 至少我试过了 泰勒 问题是这样的

translation.en: I just want to read you what I wrote, and I'm gonna try to start…
translation.zh: 我只想把我写的东西读给你听我要开始了…

translation.en: I just want you to know that this is important to me. This is--
translation.zh: 我只是想让你知道这对我很重要

translation.en: -[Scott] I totally agree with the issue, -Have--
translation.zh: 我完全认同这个问题

translation.en: -but let me explain to you… -Have you heard her?
translation.zh: -但让我给你解释…-你听她说了吗？

translation.en: [Scott] I've read the entire thing,
translation.zh: 是的 我全看过了

translation.en: and the bottom line right now: I'm terrified.
translation.zh: 是的 我全看过了 现在的底线是：我很害怕

translation.en: I'm the guy that went out and bought armored cars.
translation.zh: 我是那个出去买装甲车的人

translation.en: I worry for her safety as much as anybody does.
translation.zh: 我和其他人一样担心她的安全

translation.en: Maybe more.
translation.zh: 或许更担心

translation.en: [voice breaking] It really is a big deal to me.
translation.zh: 这真的是一件大事

translation.en: She votes against… against fair pay for women,
translation.zh: 她投票反对女性获得公平报酬

translation.en: she votes against the reauthorization of the… of the Violence Against Women Act,
translation.zh: 她投票反对重新授权《反对针对妇女暴力法案》

translation.en: which is just basically protecting us from domestic abuse and stalking. Stalking!
translation.zh: 这项法案旨在保护我们免遭家庭暴力和被人跟踪的侵害！

translation.en: She votes… She thinks that-- that if you're a gay couple
translation.zh: 她投票…她认为如果你们是同性恋人

translation.en: or even if you look like a gay couple,
translation.zh: 甚至是看起来像同性恋人

translation.en: you should be allowed to be kicked out of a restaurant.
translation.zh: 餐馆就有权把你们赶出去

translation.en: It's really basic human rights, and it's right and wrong at this point,
translation.zh: 这真的是基本人权在这一点上就是是非对错

translation.en: and I can't see another commercial…
translation.zh: 我看不到其他广告

translation.en: and see her disguising these policies
translation.zh: 却看到她将这些政策

translation.en: behind the words "Tennessee Christian values."
translation.zh: 隐藏在“田纳西州基督教价值观”这样的话后面

translation.en: Those aren't Tennessee Christian values.
translation.zh: 这些不是田纳西州基督教价值观

translation.en: I live in Tennessee. I am a Christian.
translation.zh: 我住在田纳西州 我是基督教徒

translation.en: That's not what we stand for.
translation.zh: 我们不支持这种观点

translation.en: I need to do this. I need you to just…
translation.zh: 我需要这样做 我需要你…

translation.en: Dad, I just need you to forgive me for doing it, 'cause I'm doing it.
translation.zh: 我只需要你原谅我这样做因为我要这样做

translation.en: -Okay, so... -I'm not gonna lie, I'm a little nervous.
translation.zh: -好的-我不会撒谎 我有点紧张

translation.en: -You should be. -[woman chuckles] Ooh.
translation.zh: 应该的

translation.en: -I want to do this. -Okay, so… [sighs]
translation.zh: -我想这样做-好的 那…

translation.en: I always have to bring up everything that could go sideways--
translation.zh: 我必须提一下可能会搞砸的所有事情

translation.en: -everything we need to expect. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -还有我们需要面对的一切-好

translation.en: -One: the president could come after you. -Fuck that, I don't care.
translation.zh: 首先：总统可能会跟你作对 嗯 去他的 我不在乎

translation.en: If I get bad press for saying,
translation.zh: 如果我因为说

translation.en: "Don't put a homophobic racist in office," then I get bad press for that.
translation.zh: “别让恐同的种族主义者上台”被媒体负面报道 那就这样吧

translation.en: -I really don't care. -I would stand behind that 1,000 times.
translation.zh: -我真的不在乎-我会永远支持这一点

translation.en: -Me too. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: I think that it is so frilly and spineless of me
translation.zh: 我觉得自己好没用 没有骨气

translation.en: to stand onstage and go, "Happy Pride Month, you guys,"
translation.zh: 不能站到舞台上说“各位 同性恋骄傲月快乐”

translation.en: and then not say this…
translation.zh: 而当有人当面取笑他们时

translation.en: when someone's literally coming for their neck.
translation.zh: 就不会这样说

translation.en: [quietly] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -[Andrea] All right, cheers. -Cheers, ladies.
translation.zh: -好吧 干杯-干杯 女士们

translation.en: -[Andrea] God help us all. -Cheers to the resistance.
translation.zh: -愿上帝帮助我们大家-为反抗干杯

translation.en: [chuckles] To the resist-- Stop it.
translation.zh: 为反抗干杯！得了吧

translation.en: [softly] It's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 不会有事的

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Oh, it's so scary. This is the picture.
translation.zh: 好可怕 就是这张照片

translation.en: -One… -[Taylor and Andrea] …two, three…
translation.zh: 一、二、三…

translation.en: -...go. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 看吧！

translation.en: -Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. -[Tree] Oh, my goodness.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Taylor Swift broke her silence on politics over the weekend,
translation.zh: 泰勒·斯威夫特在周末打破了政治上的沉默

translation.en: publicly backing two Democrats in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 公开支持两名田纳西州的民主党人士

translation.en: Taylor Swift is taking her first political stand,
translation.zh: 泰勒·斯威夫特首次表明了自己的政治立场

translation.en: backing Democrat Phil Bredesen.
translation.zh: 支持民主党人士菲尔·布雷德森

translation.en: The superstar making it clear to her 112 million followers on Instagram,
translation.zh: 这位超级巨星在Instagram上向1.12亿粉丝

translation.en: and the world, where she stands.
translation.zh: 和全世界表明了自己的立场

translation.en: [reporter] Taylor Swift's jumping into politics. What do you say?
translation.zh: 泰勒·斯威夫特涉足政治您有什么要对她说的？

translation.en: Let's say that I like Taylor's music about 25% less now, okay?
translation.zh: 我对泰勒音乐的喜欢程度减少了25% 好吗？

translation.en: [reporter 1] The 28-year-old pop star made her statement on Instagram.
translation.zh: 这位28岁的流行巨星在Instagram上发表声明

translation.en: [reporter 2] She broke her longstanding policy of not talking politics...
translation.zh: 她打破了长期以来不谈政治的政策

translation.en: [reporter 3] …using her voice in a new way.
translation.zh: 她以全新的方式利用自己的声音

translation.en: [reporter 4] This is so out of the norm for Taylor Swift, who...
translation.zh: 这对泰勒·斯威夫特来说太不同寻常了

translation.en: [reporter 5] Republicans for years have thought
translation.zh: 多年来 共和党人一直以为

translation.en: that Taylor Swift was a crypto-conservative, and she just…
translation.zh: 泰勒·斯威夫特是秘而不宣的保守派

translation.en: [reporter 6] It is a risky move for an entertainer to step into politics at her age,
translation.zh: 对于演艺人员来说在她这个年纪涉足政治是冒险的举动

translation.en: -at her stage in her career. -[reporter 7] Vote.org reporting
translation.zh: 投票网为您报道

translation.en: more registrations in the last day since Taylor's post than in all of August.
translation.zh: 自泰勒发帖以来最近一天的注册量超过了整个八月

translation.en: According to vote.org on Monday,
translation.zh: 据投票网周一的报道

translation.en: nationwide there have been 51,308 new registrations
translation.zh: 在过去24小时内 全国新注册的人数

translation.en: -in the past 24 hours. -[Andrea] Whoa!
-[man] So proud of you. -[Tree] Congratulations.
translation.zh: -我真替你骄傲-恭喜

translation.en: -[Taylor] Thank you. -Go, Taylor.
translation.zh: -谢谢-加油 泰勒

translation.en: Do you think it'll… Do you think…
translation.zh: 你们认为这会… 你们认为…

translation.en: Toss it out, reject it, and resist it.
translation.zh: 扔掉它、 拒绝它 然后抵制它

translation.en: Like, there is no such thing as a slut.
translation.zh: 比如世上没有荡妇

translation.en: There is no such thing as a bitch.
translation.zh: 世上没有贱人

translation.en: There is no such thing as someone who's bossy, there's just a boss.
translation.zh: 世上也没有专横之人 只有老板

translation.en: We don't want to be condemned for being multifaceted.
translation.zh: 我们不想因为自己拥有多面性而遭到谴责

translation.en: -Sorry, that was a real soapbox. -[interviewer] No.
translation.zh: 抱歉 这真的是即兴发挥

translation.en: -Oh, my God, it-- -Why did I say sorry? [grunts, chuckles]
translation.zh: 我为什么要说“抱歉”？

translation.en: -You're just-- -[interviewer] No, it's…
translation.zh: -你就是…-不 这…

translation.en: because we're trained to say sorry.
translation.zh: 因为我们被教导要说“抱歉”

translation.en: Yeah, we legitimately are. We're, like…
translation.zh: 嗯 我们自然而然就这样了

translation.en: [whispering] "Sorry, was I loud… in my own house that I bought
translation.zh: 我们会说：“抱歉我太大声了吗… 在我自己买的房子里

translation.en: with the songs that I wrote…
translation.zh: 唱自己写的

translation.en: about my own life?" [scoffs]
translation.zh: 关于自己生活的歌”

translation.en: ♪ Combat ♪ ♪ I'm ready for combat ♪
translation.zh: （每日新音乐 泰勒·斯威夫特）

translation.en: [Taylor] There's nothing that feels better than this moment.
translation.zh: 没有比现在这一刻更美好的事了

translation.en: It's out. It's out on iTunes.
translation.zh: 推出了 在iTunes上推出了

translation.en: It's out on iTunes.
translation.zh: -在iTunes上推出了-天哪

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: （专辑《恋人》发行当晚）

translation.en: It's out. It's out. It's out.
translation.zh: 推出了！

translation.en: We're listening to it right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在就在听

translation.en: [Jack] This is so cool. Toast to Taylor.
translation.zh: 太酷了 敬泰勒

translation.en: No one is this good and works harder.
translation.zh: 没有人如此优秀 如此努力

translation.en: If you're that good, usually you don't work that hard.
translation.zh: 如果你这么优秀通常就不会这么努力

translation.en: -I love you guys all so much. -[guest] We love you.
translation.zh: 我太爱你们了

translation.en: After 13 years of constantly feeling like I was misunderstood,
translation.zh: 13年来 我一直觉得自己被误解在这之后

translation.en: knowing that everything that happened was all gonna turn into this moment is…
translation.zh: 现在知道之前发生的一切都是为了这一时刻的到来

translation.en: fucking awesome. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他妈的太爽了！

translation.en: ♪ I ride off all alone ♪
translation.zh: （史黛拉 X 泰勒·斯威夫特）

translation.en: [Taylor] There's this thing people say about celebrities,
translation.zh: 人们总是这么说名人

translation.en: that they're frozen at the age they got famous,
translation.zh: 说他们在成名的那个年纪就被桎梏了

translation.en: and that's kind of what happened to me.
translation.zh: 我也经历过这种事

translation.en: [Taylor] I had a lot of growing up to do, just trying to catch up to 29.
translation.zh: 我马上就要29岁了在很多方面都需要更成熟

translation.en: Just gonna go have fun.
translation.zh: 就是去开心一把

translation.en: No one out there that I know of in the audience actively hates me.
translation.zh: 我所知道的观众中 没人真正讨厌我

translation.en: Not get dead-faced.
translation.zh: 不要板着脸

translation.en: -[Andrea] Have fun the whole time. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -在整个过程中尽情享受-好

translation.en: [assistant] Ready to do this?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Ready… Totally ready. -[assistant] Ready.
translation.zh: 好了 完全准备好了

translation.en: [Taylor] May 19th, 2003.
"Oh, I tried to practice my songs, but I completely psyched myself out
translation.zh: “我试着练习自己的歌 但我信心全失

translation.en: and broke down crying.
translation.zh: 哭了出来

translation.en: I don't know if I can do this.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己能否做到

translation.en: I want it so bad, but I get so scared of what might happen.
translation.zh: 我好期待但很害怕可能会发生的事情

translation.en: Relax, I can handle it.
translation.zh: 放轻松 我可以应付的

translation.en: I'm young. I'm talented. They'll see it in me.
translation.zh: 我年轻 才华横溢他们会在我身上看到这点

translation.en: I've got to hang on."
translation.zh: 我只要坚持就好”

translation.en: [Taylor] I wanna still have a sharp pen
translation.zh: 我仍希望自己拥有犀利的笔锋

translation.en: and a thin skin
translation.zh: 细腻的皮肤

translation.en: and an open heart.
translation.zh: 和开放的心态

translation.en: ♪ Only the young ♪
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：杨海霞
